wordpressPost.title: January 2019: New Year, New Zealand Edition
wordpressPost.content:
I spent the entirety of January in New Zealand to hang out with Kylea and her family. This post is going to be a short one as I’m writing about my month in New Zealand in three separate posts:

  • Part 1: Chillin’ Up North
  • Part 2: South Island in a Camper Van
  • Part 3: Chillin’ Further Up North (coming soon!)

I’m back home in Montreal now and getting back into my regular routine. I can’t believe how fast January went! Seems like just yesterday when I flew out for New Zealand on New Year’s Eve.

As much as I miss the beach life in New Zealand, it feels good to be back here in Montreal. I can’t wait to see my friends again and to get back to training jiu jitsu!
